name: Cell site survey
description: Taking measurements to assess which cells actually provide service at a specific location (adapted from Tart et al 2012).
details: Can involve: spot sample, location survey, area survey, cell survey (Tart et al 2012)
references: Tart, M., Brodie, I., Gleed, N. and Matthews, J., 2012. Historic cell site analysisâ€“Overview of principles and survey methodologies. Digital Investigation, 8(3-4), pp.185-193.
Hoy, J., 2023. Forensic radio survey techniques for cell site analysis. John Wiley & Sons.
